text: @TuckerCarlson The "Chinese" Coronavirus? Are you fuc*king kidding me?  How is Chris Matthews off the air, but racist ppl like you are still on? @FoxNews I saw a clip in which @seanhannity called the coronavirus a hoax tonight as he was talking to @RepDougCollins Is this responsible journalism?
